DoorLockLED.description: The state of the Door Lock LED. When Lit, this indicates that the Enclosure should not be removed since the drives are currently in use.

enumDescriptions.Lit: The Door Lock LED is lit.
enumDescriptions.Off: The Door Lock LED is off.
enumDescriptions.Unknown: The state of the Door Lock LED cannot be determined.

DriveBayCount.description: Number of drive bays supported within the storage enclosure

EnclosureLogicalID.description: Unique ID for the storage enclosure

FaultLED.description: The state of the Fault LED.

enumDescriptions.Unknown: The state of the Fault LED cannot be determined.

FirmwareVersion.description: The firmware version of this storage enclosure

IndicatorLED.description: The state of the indicator LED.

enumDescriptions.Unknown: The state of the Indicator LED cannot be determined.

Links.description: The URIs to the resource related to HpSmartStorageStorageEnclosure

Drives.description: link to a collection of membertype HpSmartStorageDiskDrive

enumDescriptions.Controller:Box: This format typically used in controller context where the drive would be identified using the controller port and JBOD box number
enumDescriptions.SwitchPort:Box: This format typically used in a SAS switch context where the drive would be identified using the switch port and JBOD box number
enumDescriptions.SwitchPort:SwitchBay: This format typically used in a SAS switch context where the drive would be identified using the switch port and ICM bay number for the switch

Manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the storage enclosure

Model.description: The model string for the storage enclosure

PartNumber.description: Part number of this storage enclosure

SerialNumber.description: The serial number for this storage enclosure

SubEnclosureLocation.description: Location within the chassis if this storage enclosure is part of a larger chassis hosting multiple storage enclosures

title: #HpeSmartStorageStorageEnclosure.v2_0_0.HpeSmartStorageStorageEnclosure
